extendedInfo.description: You are left alone in the danger zone!Shoot looming zombies , and survive!##Features- Various weapons are available, like handgun, shotgun, machinegun and knife.- Get the point and empower your weapons!- As time passes, zombies will be more dangerous##How to play-Tilt your device in every direction to set your sights with the acceleration sensor.-Tap to shoot the bullet!-Push the button to change weapon-Push the button to reload weapon
